updates.title: Enhanced Header Physics Update
updates.content: We've completely upgraded our ball physics system! Experience more realistic ball trajectories, improved header accuracy, and smoother aerial duels. The new mechanics reward perfect timing on jumps and add visual indicators for special power shots.

updates.title: Custom Celebration Moves
updates.content: Introducing custom goal celebrations! Create your own victory animations and taunt opponents after scoring. The new editor lets you design unique dance moves and showboating sequences to humiliate your rivals.
